mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.HAND_MAPPING_YN AS handMappingYn /* 수동 맵핑 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODIDT AS modidt /* 수정일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.HAND_MAPPING_YN = #{handMappingYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수동 맵핑 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_MAPPING_FACL_PK(P),FK_EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL_EZC_MA(R),SYS_C0011114(C) */ AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_MAPPING_FACL_PK(P),FK_EZC_FACL_EZC_MAPPING_FACL(R),SYS_C0011115(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.HAND_MAPPING_YN = #{handMappingYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수동 맵핑 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODIDT = #{modidt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.HAND_MAPPING_YN AS handMappingYn /* 수동 맵핑 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODIDT AS modidt /* 수정일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.HAND_MAPPING_YN = #{handMappingYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수동 맵핑 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.MODIDT = #{modidt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_MAPPING_FACL SET /* 맵핑 시설 */ HAND_MAPPING_YN = #{handMappingYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수동 맵핑 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODIDT = #{modidt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
